question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. clock
B. blue board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The clock tower is in the foreground on the right side of the image, while the blue board is on a distant building structure in the background, making the clock clearly closer to the camera.
